# The `R600ExpandSpecialInstrs.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Vector, Reduction, and Cube instructions need to fill the entire instruction group to work correctly.

This pass expands these individual instructions into several instructions that will completely fill the instruction group.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsCube = TII-&gt;isCubeOp(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsReduction &amp;&amp; !IsVector &amp;&amp; !IsCube) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expand the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reduction instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;X = DP4 T1&#95;XYZW, T2&#95;XYZW</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// becomes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TO&#95;X = DP4 T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TO&#95;Y (write masked) = DP4 T1&#95;Y, T2&#95;Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TO&#95;Z (write masked) = DP4 T1&#95;Z, T2&#95;Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TO&#95;W (write masked) = DP4 T1&#95;W, T2&#95;W</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Vector instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;X = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// becomes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;X = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;Y (write masked) = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;Z (write masked) = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;W (write masked) = MULLO&#95;INT T1&#95;X, T2&#95;X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cube instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;XYZW = CUBE T1&#95;XYZW</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// becomes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TO&#95;X = CUBE T1&#95;Z, T1&#95;Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;Y = CUBE T1&#95;Z, T1&#95;X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;Z = CUBE T1&#95;X, T1&#95;Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// T0&#95;W = CUBE T1&#95;Y, T1&#95;Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Chan = 0; Chan &lt; 4; Chan++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> DstReg =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(TII-&gt;getOperandIdx(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, R600::OpName::dst)).getReg();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
